actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit advanced refunding of private activity bonds with governmental bonds under certain limited circumstances.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the exemption from Federal income tax of interest on a bond if, as of the date of the bond being refunded, the bond would not be classified as a private activity bond.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit advanced refunding of private activity bonds with governmental bonds under certain limited circumstances.
